title: Hyundai to deploy AI-powered humanoid robots at Georgia auto factory
description: Korean automaker Hyundai and its subsidiary, Boston Dynamics, unveil a sweeping artificial intelligence robotics strategy at the CES trade show Monday in Las Vegas.
content:
Korean auto giant plans to use humanoid robots at its Georgia factory starting in 2028.

title: Does AI belong in the exam room? Lawsuit alleges Sharp violated patient privacy
description: A recent lawsuit filed in San Diego Superior Court alleges that Sharp HealthCare recorded conversations between doctors and their patients without written consent, using the information to document visits with an artificial intelligence program developed by a private company in Pittsburgh.

title: Stock Markets Reach New Heights Amid Geopolitical and Economic Shifts
description: Major stock indexes, including the Dow Jones, reached record highs as investors focused on key market data. Geopolitical tension from Venezuela was countered by optimism in artificial intelligence, thereby driving financial momentum. Meanwhile, the U.S. dollar and oil prices fluctuated due to varying global factors.
